articles.content: Globally, an estimated 290,000 to 650,000 people typically die each year from seasonal flu. Last year, however, was different. The northern hemisphere winter of 2020-21 saw some of the lowest recorde… [+12382 chars]

articles.title: There May Be People Who Are Genetically Resistant to COVID-19, Scientists Say - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Two humans are at least 99.9 percent genetically identical to each other. But it's that 0.1 percent or so that makes us special.
articles.content:
Two humans are at least 99.9 percent genetically identical to each other. But it's that 0.1 percent or so that makes us special.

articles.title: Fasting May Offer Health Benefits Beyond Dieting, Experiment in Mice Suggests - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Eating less often does more to improve the health and lifespan of rodents than simply eating less, a study said Monday.
articles.content:
